author: Pamela Muse
text:
The City of Redondo Beach, CA is moving its Recreation and Community Services Department from a 12,000 square foot campus to a 6,000 sq. foot modular structure.  They have a very paper-intensive group of services (including federally funded housing assistance, etc.)  and storage has become a real problem.     They are looking for filing and storage systems that can help maximize the space - e.g. floor to ceiling moving systems, as opposed to four foot metal cabinets, etc.   
If you can suggest storage solutions, Vendors or any relative information, please forward ASAP.  
Thank you!  
Pamela Muse  
Western Regional Director  
Alliance for Innovation  
888-468-6450  
pmuse@transformgov.org
title: Filing & Storage Solution Systems
